summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6016 for the improvement of 11th Avenue West from West Ray Street on the east to West Newell Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 81184, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
